name: C-Train Loop
description:
This is the final call for the c-tain loop boarding at platform bwjam8 heading to the s̵̬̫͆͋e̴̪̜͛̇a̸̙̫̋. Once boarded, passengers are kindly asked to move their way to the front of the train and keep their hands and arms away from the sea life.  Thank you for your co-operation and remember to always choose the c-train for your aquatic travels! 

Controls:

movement - arrow keys, wasd, or ijkl

attack - left click with mouse, or x, or space

esc - takes you to main menu from any screen

Made for bwjam8 <3
